name: La Sportiva Miura VS Rock Shoes - Women's
description: These women's-specific performance slippers combine the classic Miura last with a rand tensioning system. They excel on thin edges and in tiny pockets. The shape is not as down-turned as other high-performance shoes, so they do moderately well for smearing or jamming.Uppers are leather with synthetic lining. The under-foot section is unlined for comfort and to keep them sensitive.Triple Velcro® closure for easy on/off and to tune in a performance fit.Slingshot rand and power hinge system focus power over the toes for precise edging.1.1mm Laspoflex midsole under the forefoot for edging power.4mm sticky Vibram® XS Grip2™ rubber outsole.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
